data.comment: The referee blows his whistle to start the first-half. Lazio with the kick-off.
Throw-in Crotone.
In the minute 2, Juan Luca Sacchi signals a free kick to Lazio in their own half.
Can Lazio capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Crotone's half?
Throw-in high up the field for Lazio in Crotone.
In the minute 3, Juan Luca Sacchi awards the home team a throw-in.
Crotone awarded a free kick in their own half.
Crotone have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 4, Crotone needs to be cautious. Lazio have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Crotone in their own half.
Arkadiusz Reca's header is off-target for Crotone.
In the minute 5, Ball goes out of play for a Lazio goal kick.
Juan Luca Sacchi signals a throw-in for Lazio, close to Crotone's area.
Throw-in for Crotone in the half of Lazio.
In the minute 7, Ciro Immobile of Lazio gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Crotone at Stadio Ezio Scida.
Free kick for Crotone in the half of Lazio.
In the minute 9, Joaquin Correa for Lazio drives towards goal at Stadio Ezio Scida. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In Crotone a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick Lazio.
In the minute 10, Andrea Rispoli (Crotone) has received a first yellow card.
Lazio's Luis Alberto breaks free at Stadio Ezio Scida. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Juan Luca Sacchi awards Crotone a goal kick.
In the minute 12, Crotone awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Crotone close to the penalty box.
Simeon Nwankwo for Crotone gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 13, Lazio have a goal kick.
Luis Alberto (Lazio) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
Lazio's Marco Parolo attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 17, It's a goal kick for the home team in Crotone.
Free kick for Crotone in their own half.
Lazio's Lucas Leiva gets in a shot on goal at Stadio Ezio Scida. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 20, In Crotone Crotone drive forward through Junior Messias. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Goal! Ciro Immobile heads Lazio into a 0-1 lead.
Marco Parolo instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 23, Throw-in for Crotone at Stadio Ezio Scida.
Ball safe as Lazio is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 25, Juan Luca Sacchi awards Crotone a goal kick.
Juan Luca Sacchi signals a free kick to Lazio.
Crotone's Luca Marrone has been booked in Crotone.
Crotone awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 26, Mohamed Fares is booked for the away team.
In Crotone Crotone attack through Arkadiusz Reca. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Crotone.
In the minute 29, Free kick for Lazio in their own half.
Lucas Leiva is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Lucas Leiva is back on the pitch.
In the minute 31, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Juan Luca Sacchi signals a Lazio throw-in in Crotone's half.
Can Lazio capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Crotone's half?
In the minute 33, Crotone have a goal kick.
Juan Luca Sacchi signals a free kick to Lazio in their own half.
Lazio to take a throw-in in Crotone territory.
In the minute 34, In Crotone Lazio's Ciro Immobile is caught offside.
Marco Parolo gets his shot on target but fails to score for Lazio.
Lazio have been awarded a corner by Juan Luca Sacchi.
In the minute 38, Can Crotone get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lazio's half?
Lazio's Joaquin Correa is whistled for offside at Stadio Ezio Scida.
Ball safe as Crotone is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 40, Simeon Nwankwo for the home team is judged to be offside.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Crotone are pushing forward but Simeon Nwankwo's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 42, Ball goes out of play for a Lazio goal kick.
Mohamed Fares (Lazio) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Corner awarded to Lazio.
In the minute 44, Free kick for Crotone in their own half.
Throw-in for Crotone close to the penalty box.
Juan Luca Sacchi signals a Crotone throw-in in Lazio's half.
In the minute 45, 1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Throw-in for Crotone at Stadio Ezio Scida.
In Crotone a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Crotone's Andrea Rispoli gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Lazio at Stadio Ezio Scida.
In the minute 45, The first half has been concluded at Stadio Ezio Scida.
In the minute 45, Marco Parolo (Lazio) has received a yellow card from Juan Luca Sacchi.
The second half is underway in Crotone - Crotone with the kick-off.
Crotone's Ahmad Benali is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 46, Throw-in for Crotone in the half of Lazio.
The away team have replaced Marco Parolo with Jean Akpa. This is the first substitution made today by Simone Inzaghi.
In the minute 46, Adam Marusic is replacing Mohamed Fares for Lazio at Stadio Ezio Scida.
Giovanni Stroppa (Crotone) is making a first substitution, with Pedro Pereira replacing Andrea Rispoli.
Juan Luca Sacchi awards Lazio a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Crotone.
In the minute 48, Lazio pushes forward through Joaquin Correa, whose finish on goal is saved.
Lazio have been awarded a corner by Juan Luca Sacchi.
Crotone to take a throw-in in Lazio territory.
In the minute 50, Can Crotone get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lazio's half?
Throw-in for Lazio in their own half.
Lazio to take a throw-in in Crotone territory.
In the minute 53, Juan Luca Sacchi awards the home team a throw-in.
Ball goes out of play for a Lazio goal kick.
Lazio awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 55, Crotone drives forward and Jacopo Petriccione gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Free kick for Lazio in the half of Crotone.
Giuseppe Cuomo (Crotone) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 58, It's now 0-2 in Crotone as Joaquin Correa scores for Lazio.
That's a fine assist from Ciro Immobile.
Throw-in Lazio.
In the minute 59, Juan Luca Sacchi signals a free kick to Lazio.
Crotone's Arkadiusz Reca gets in a shot on goal at Stadio Ezio Scida. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Goal kick for Lazio at Stadio Ezio Scida.
Throw-in for Crotone in the half of Lazio.
In the minute 62, Simone Inzaghi is making the team's third substitution at Stadio Ezio Scida with Felipe Caicedo replacing Joaquin Correa.
Can Crotone get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lazio's half?
In the minute 63, Arkadiusz Reca of Crotone smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Juan Luca Sacchi signals a Crotone throw-in in Lazio's half.
Free kick Crotone.
In the minute 66, Throw-in for Crotone at Stadio Ezio Scida.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Denis Dragus is replacing Jacopo Petriccione for the home team.
In the minute 69, Corner awarded to Lazio.
Corner awarded to Lazio.
Lazio have been awarded a corner by Juan Luca Sacchi.
In the minute 70, Lazio push upfield and Felipe Caicedo gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Crotone defence.
Juan Luca Sacchi awards the away team a throw-in.
In Crotone Lazio attack through Felipe Caicedo. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 72, Crotone have a goal kick.
Throw-in Lazio.
Lazio awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 74, Throw-in for Crotone in their own half.
The away team replace Ciro Immobile with Andreas Pereira.
Ball safe as Crotone is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 77, Juan Luca Sacchi signals a throw-in for Lazio, close to Crotone's area.
Lazio to take a throw-in in Crotone territory.
Wesley Hoedt is replacing Patric for Lazio at Stadio Ezio Scida.
In the minute 79, Emmanuel Riviere is on a sub for Milos Vulic for Crotone.
Crotone have been awarded a corner by Juan Luca Sacchi.
Ball goes out of play for a Lazio goal kick.
In the minute 81, Throw-in for Crotone at Stadio Ezio Scida.
Juan Luca Sacchi signals a Crotone throw-in in Lazio's half.
Crotone's Emmanuel Riviere gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Lazio defender.
In the minute 82, Corner awarded to Crotone.
Lazio awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Crotone get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lazio's half?
In the minute 83, Juan Luca Sacchi signals a free kick to Lazio in their own half.
Crotone awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Crotone a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Crotone are coming forward and Denis Dragus gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Crotone.
In the minute 86, Lucas Leiva for Lazio has been booked by Juan Luca Sacchi and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 87, Free kick for Lazio in their own half.
Juan Luca Sacchi signals a free kick to Crotone in their own half.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Lazio needs to be cautious. Crotone have an attacking throw-in.
Goal kick for Lazio at Stadio Ezio Scida.
Throw-in for Crotone in their own half.
Emmanuel Riviere for Crotone is whistled offside.
Ball safe as Lazio is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 0-2.
At Stadio Ezio Scida, Luis Alberto has been yellow-carded for the away team.
